ingredients.item: 250g pouch Waitrose Barley, Wheatberries, Spelt & Rice

instructions.step: Brush the tuna steaks with a little oil and griddle for 1-2 minutes each side according to taste.
Meanwhile, microwave the butternut spaghetti and grains according to the pack instructions, and mix together with the coriander and French dressing. Place the tuna on top and serve.
